pacman

Class StrongMonster

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameCharacter
      • pacman.Monster
        • pacman.StrongMonster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor

    public class StrongMonster
extends Monster
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Strong Monster' represents the strong monster in the game panel. It beats both regular and mighty pacman. In addition the strong monsters chases the pacman once it is in regular/mighty mode but run from it when it's in super mode.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move()
        Overrides the move method in Game Character, in order to calculate the priority of the next possible moves. In each step the monster calculates its location relative to pacman, and chooses the the one with the greatest distance to pacman. If the chosen move is not a legal move, than it goes to the step with the next priority.
        Overrides:
        move in class GameCharacter
        Returns:
        True - if the move was accomplished successfully, False - otherwise.

      • setState

        public void setState(int state)
        Sets the state from chase to run, based on pacman's mode
        Parameters:
        state - - Chase or Run
